title: Cant close lol after game in mac
body: when i updated to osx 10.11.2, i cant close the game after finishing it, i have to force shut down my mac to close it, how can i fix it?

replies.body:
This is possibly just a compatibility issue with that version of OSX, as I understand it a decent amount of software vendors (Microsoft, etc) had issues with their software crashing/hanging on OSX El Capitan.

Do you have a time machine backup from a previous version of OSX (Yosemite) that you can restore to see if that is the issue?

**I am not a consumer of Apple software and my post above is merely speculation, if anyone who actually plays league on a mac can chime in here that would be great.**
